name: Kent Justus

text: Ordered a pizza on Halloween at 7:30 pm. 20 minutes later  got a call that they are not taking any more deliveries, due to unforeseen circumstances. App mentioned none of this and happily took my order. I'm guessing they're under staffed on ‚Ä¶More

text: One star because i called them 2 hours beforw close and nobody wanted to answer. At the very least I spent 10 minutes across a 1 bour period to listen a dial tone.

text:
This is the worst papa johns. They r always late. They never give all the dips/condiments that are ordered.

name: The Chicago Flames Musical Band
text: Little pricy but great taste.. No heartburns even if over eaten

name: Ken Marsala
text: Horrible service. Anytime i place an order with them its an hour and a half to get a pizza. Even at 10am. Ridiculous.. pizza comes cold.. the worst

name: Jeff Clark
text: This is the best papa johns around here. This is the best pizza around that is not deep dish. Join the points club. One time I got four pizzas free with my points at one time. They are fast. Delivery comes about 20 minutes to my house.

name: Jose Irizarry
text: Great service by the phone for delivery order and the delivery person was friendly and professional, but I'm not 100 % happy about the way they cooking the winds. I'm order my winds crispy and it's not coming right. Beside that the service was OK I'm always use papa Johns.

name: Pixie
text:
Papa John's has a new credit card system,
wouldn't accept my Discover Card.  Eli a very nice employee paid for my order.  Should be more people like him in this world.
Thx Eli!!!

name: Darrell Spitzer
text: They were better previously but last few months they've messed up order a little almost every time.  No sauce on wing order, missing side sauce, Overcooked or undercooked pizza and chicken. So.... yeah...

name: Ellsworth Wolf
text: Ordered 2 pizzas via the app, which we always have done.  2 pizzas were delivered, but one was incorrect.  We called the store, and explained what had happened.  The employee put us on hold to talk to the manager.  After talking to the ‚Ä¶More

name: Ffvdf Fghfd
text: Made an account just to say this place is horrible. Ordered twice online previous to this and it was okay pizza(other papa johns are better). Third time they charged me and never recieved my pizza. I then called them to no avail. Out of my money now.  Never order here again.

name: Jose L. Garcia
text: 2 1/2 hours to make and deliver a medium pizza is ridiculous, don't have drivers??? Well say that when I'm ordering and I might chose to pick up, who waits over 2 hours for a pizza??? long time customer but no more, service been going down lately

text: The pizza was good but the lady who took my order was very rude. She got mad because I wanted to add an extra topping.  Poor customer service.

text: Great service, made the pizza just as we asked! Never had any problems from here.

text: Another pizza place wanted to order on phone but wanted to see prices first. Can't see prices online unless I order. Will not order online bad experiences. So on to 3rd Pizza place now. Sorry for your loss of business

text: Horrible service.  Pizza is ok but the owner and manager are so rude and could care less about whether your happy or not.  They will make the pizza send it out cold and could care less and then if you call they tell you tough.  Horrible, ridiculous service.  Stay far away!!!!
